body:
(please no hate!)

After hours to days of playing and tryharding, i finally got to the 1st/front page on the Avicus
Network (Nebula Games) DTM Weekly's, alongside w/ a few guys i know around the server

Gratz to
- InfiniteLunacy (top 1)
- HyperActive123 (top 2) [note: i thought he was lying when he said about being no. 1 x3]
- ImAngelz (top 3)

- everyone else who got on the top 20!
(also nice to see a fellow filipino; InfiniteLunacy on top of the leaderboards! napakagaling!)

title: Hit my Goal on the Weekly's!

replies.body:
Congratulations on your achievement, but I'm afraid threads about personal achievements aren't allowed on the forums.
